summary: Unit test module that exercises the Checkov Terraform rule checking that AWS MQ Broker resources have the minor auto‑upgrade feature enabled, by running the Checkov runner on example Terraform configurations and asserting expected pass/fail outcomes.
business_intent: Ensure infrastructure‑as‑code complies with best practices for AWS MQ Broker by automatically detecting missing minor auto‑upgrade settings, helping teams maintain secure and up‑to‑date broker deployments.
